name: @ontario-lrc/ontario-design-system-angular-material-styles
description: A collection of SCSS files that will re-style Angular Material components to either match exactly, or mimic as closely as possible, the ODS look. The goal is to provide developers with a centralized location for SCSS ODS styles for Angular Material components to share, collaborate, and leverage reusable code, promoting code reusability and reducing development time and effort.
